name: ABx(Dev. Demo)
description:
ABx is a classical space-shooter game, that has a dark backstory. There are 5 acts to this game so far, see if you can beat all of them.

Whenever an update comes, I will update this desc. and page

Leave in the comments what should be added (and/or fixed) in DU2(Demo Update 2.0), other than the How-To-Play issue, which WILL be fixed

Notices:

-CratePak System is released and is updating!

-DU 2.0 is well in-development! It will be released shortly!(v11.2)

_____________________________________________________________

This game is a sequel to my original AstroBlaster game(not the arcade game AT ALL)

This game is free, and will always be free, because I am a nice person:)
